mapper.insert: insert into artistInfo (aname, auserid, apasswd, aemail, aphone) values (#{aname}, #{auserid}, #{apasswd}, #{aemail}, #{aphone})
mapper.select: select count(auserid) cnt from artistInfo where auserid = #{auserid}
select count(auserid) cnt from artistInfo where auserid = #{auserid} and apasswd = #{apasswd}
